DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Finding Report Inclusion Yes or No Response
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not a copy of the lab report was submitted.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The outcome of a laboratory test._A short textual account; having provided a short account._The addition of somebody or something to, or the presence of somebody or something in, a group or mixture.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The outcome of a laboratory test.:Report; a short account.

Concepts.definition: The outcome of a laboratory test.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.

Property.preferredDefinition: The addition of somebody or something to, or the presence of somebody or something in, a group or mixture, particularly, a passive, usually temporary, product of cell activity within the cytoplasm or nucleus.

Concepts.definition: Medical and/or social characteristics which are necessary for a subject to be allowed to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. Meeting inclusion criteria is not a sufficient condition for entry or recruitment of a subject into the study. Characteristics limiting the eligibility of a subject for the clinical study must be considered.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Definition was changed to reflect that the concept code C38470 was retired and replaced with C36292. AK 05/15/09

ValueDomain.preferredName: Laboratory Finding Yes or No Response

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The outcome of a laboratory test.
A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

DataElement.changeDescription: The definition was changed to reflect the fact that concept code C38470 was retired and replaced with C36292.  AK  05/18/10  Added AQT. AK 5/25/11  Added AQT - 2/8/12 SLS. Added alt name and Application SQT for 2005. AK 8/11/13  Added AQT 2013-08-29 SLS. Added human readable def. System generated def displayed as alt def.
